index.create_room_dialog_hint_1: You can choose a simple word ROOM-NAME for a public room, or hit the Dice icon for a random string that will only be findable by people who you share a link with!
index.headline_1: Mornin is an instant audio conferencing service
index.headline_2: Talk with your friends, no need to install an app or register!
